create-hmac

Node style HMACs for use in the browser, with native HMAC functions in node. API is the same as HMACs in node:

```js var createHmac = require(‘create-hmac’) var hmac = createHmac(‘sha224’, new Buffer(“secret key”)) hmac.update(‘synchronous write’) //optional encoding parameter hmac.digest() // synchronously get result with optional encoding parameter

hmac.write(‘write to it as a stream’) hmac.end() //remember it’s a stream hmac.read() //only if you ended it as a stream though ```
